channel.title: Hebrew Podcasts
channel.description: Hebrew Podcasts makes learning to speak conversational Hebrew practical and enjoyable. Each lesson covers a topic with a Hebrew dialog that is explained in detail. Each Hebrew lesson is enhanced by a lesson guide that provides further information. The guide includes a full transcript, translation, explanations, additional examples, and exercises.
channel.itunes:author: hebrewpodcasts.com
channel.itunes:subtitle: Learn Hebrew At Your Leisure
channel.itunes:summary: Hebrew Podcasts makes learning conversational Hebrew practical and enjoyable. Each lesson covers a topic with a Hebrew dialog that is explained in detail. Each lesson is enhanced by a lesson guide that provides further information. The guide includes a full transcript, translation, explanations, additional examples, and exercises.

item.title: Lesson 098 - Taxes
item.itunes:subtitle: Taxes
item.description: Eli had a sleepless night being anxious about filing his annual tax return. His wife, Daphna, reassures him and offers to help.
item.itunes:summary: Eli had a sleepless night being anxious about filing his annual tax return. His wife, Daphna, reassures him and offers to help.

item.title: Lesson 097 - Post Office
item.itunes:subtitle: Post Office
item.description: Gali is going to the post office to send a couple of packages, not knowing that she chose the busiest time. The post office clerk Eli, understanding her frustration from standing in the long line, helps her with all her requests.
item.itunes:summary: Gali is going to the post office to send a couple of packages, not knowing that she chose the busiest time. The post office clerk Eli, understanding her frustration from standing in the long line, helps her with all her requests.

item.title: Lesson 096 - Israeli Elections
item.itunes:subtitle: Israeli Elections
item.description: New immigrants to Israel come from many different countries with different political systems. Noa is an Ulpan teacher and today she's teaching her students about the election system in Israel. Some of her students are soon to become Israeli citizens and vote for the first time.
item.itunes:summary: New immigrants to Israel come from many different countries with different political systems. Noa is an Ulpan teacher and today she's teaching her students about the election system in Israel. Some of her students are soon to become Israeli citizens and vote for the first time.

item.title: Lesson 095 - Naomi Shemer
item.itunes:subtitle: Naomi Shemer
item.description: Gali is preparing to publish a book about the songwriter Naomi Shemer and she asks the help of Yossi who is a music consultant. Yossi is excited to help because he admires the songs of Naomi Shemer.
item.itunes:summary: Gali is preparing to publish a book about the songwriter Naomi Shemer and she asks the help of Yossi who is a music consultant. Yossi is excited to help because he admires the songs of Naomi Shemer.

item.title: Lesson 094 - Investments
item.itunes:subtitle: Investments
item.description: Eli just sold his car and wants to invest his money. He is consulting with Batya, his investment advisor, about how to invest in tough economic times. Let's hear her advice.
item.itunes:summary: Eli just sold his car and wants to invest his money. He is consulting with Batya, his investment advisor, about how to invest in tough economic times. Let's hear her advice.

item.title: Lesson 003 - School
item.itunes:subtitle: School
item.description: In this beginner-level lesson we'll meet Noa again and talk with her about her school. We'll learn some new vocabulary related to school and we'll touch on the subject of counting and ordinal numbers.
item.itunes:summary: In this beginner-level lesson we'll meet Noa again and talk with her about her school. We'll learn some new vocabulary related to school and we'll touch on the subject of counting and ordinal numbers.

item.title: Lesson 003A - EASY - Prelude to Lesson 3
item.itunes:subtitle: Prelude to Lesson 3
item.description: This special lesson is designed to prepare you for the dialog in lesson 3 by teaching the vocabulary that's needed for that lesson. This lesson should therefore make studying lesson 3 easier and more enjoyable.
item.itunes:summary: This special lesson is designed to prepare you for the dialog in lesson 3 by teaching the vocabulary that's needed for that lesson. This lesson should therefore make studying lesson 3 easier and more enjoyable.

item.title: Lesson 002 - Alphabet
item.itunes:subtitle: Alphabet
item.description: In this beginner-level lesson we'll learn the twenty-two letters of the Hebrew alphabet. We'll say the name of each letter and hear a word or two that begin with that letter. We'll then discuss pronunciation.
item.itunes:summary: In this beginner-level lesson we'll learn the twenty-two letters of the Hebrew alphabet. We'll say the name of each letter and hear a word or two that begin with that letter. We'll then discuss pronunciation.

item.title: Lesson 001 - Introduction
item.itunes:subtitle: Introduction
item.description: Welcome to the first lesson of Hebrew Podcasts. In this beginner-level lesson we'll meet Rina. She'll help us practice some greetings such as saying hello and "how are you?" Rina will tell us about her school and her favorite teacher. Through the dialog with Rina you'll learn some new words.
item.itunes:summary: Welcome to the first lesson of Hebrew Podcasts. In this beginner-level lesson we'll meet Rina. She'll help us practice some greetings such as saying hello and "how are you?" Rina will tell us about her school and her favorite teacher. Through the dialog with Rina you'll learn some new words.

item.title: Lesson 001A - EASY - Prelude to Lesson 1
item.itunes:subtitle: Prelude to Lesson 1
item.description: If you are just starting to learn Hebrew and find that our lesson 1 goes too fast, then this easy-level lesson is for you. It's designed to prepare you for lesson 1 by covering the basic vocabulary that you'll need in that lesson.
item.itunes:summary: If you are just starting to learn Hebrew and find that our lesson 1 goes too fast, then this easy-level lesson is for you. It's designed to prepare you for lesson 1 by covering the basic vocabulary that you'll need in that lesson.
